channel.title: Highscores
channel.description: I've made my highscores like almost complete. I just need to fix one problem. [img]http://sagescapepk.com/problem.jpg[/img] The background doesn't stretch out. I've tried expanding the pixels, but it makes everything go down. Any help?

item.title: Highscores
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:3, topic:378394”]For highscores.php find this line and replace everything from that line to the bottom of the page:
Find:

<div id="scores_head" class="subsectionHeader" style="padding: 0px;">

Delete everything until you reach the end of the file and paste this:

[code]

Overall Hiscores
<? if(!$_GET['playerName']) { if(!$_GET['name']) { if($_GET['type'] != "0" && $_GET['type'] != "" && $_GET['type'] != "PK") { 
				showPlayers($_GET['type']);
			} else if($_GET['type'] == "PK") {
				PkRating();
			} else {
				OverallHiscore();
			}
		} else {
			showPlayer($_GET['name']);
		}
	} else {
		showSig($_GET['playerName']);
	}
	
	?>

[/code]

<div class="friendsContent">

Replace the remainder of the page with:

item.title: Highscores
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Yeah, I almost have them exactly the way I want. I’l search for the extra . Arghhh! I got everything fixed except for the highscores.php. I can’t get it to work on that one.

[code]

<?php include("mysql.php"); include("functions.php"); ?> SageScape Hiscores /*\*/@import url(RS_Styles.css);/**/
Location: Forums > Hiscores
SageScape Hiscores
Skills
  • Overall

  • Attack

  • <a href=“http://sagescape.zapto.org/highscores/skills.php?type=2” target="_self"" class=" Defence ico">

    Defence

  • Strength

  • Hitpoints

  • Ranged

  • Prayer

  • Magic

  • Cooking

  • Woodcutting

  • Fletching

  • Fishing

  • Firemaking

  • Crafting

  • Smithing

  • Mining

  • Herblore

  • Agility

  • Thieving

  • <a href=“http://sagescape.zapto.org/highscores/skills.php?type=19” target="_self"" class=" Slayer ico">

    Slayer

  • Farming

  • Runecrafting

  • Conquering

  • Construction

  • Kill\Death(Ratio)
Skills
Overall Hiscores
<? if(!$_GET['playerName']) { if(!$_GET['name']) { if($_GET['type'] != "0" && $_GET['type'] != "" && $_GET['type'] != "PK") { 
				showPlayers($_GET['type']);
			} else if($_GET['type'] == "PK") {
				PkRating();	
			} else {
				OverallHiscore();
			}
		} else {
			showPlayer($_GET['name']);
		}
	} else {
		showSig($_GET['playerName']);
	}
	
	?>

[/code][code]function OverallHiscore() { include "mysql.php"; if(!$top_hiscore) { $top_hiscore = "101"; } echo '
'; $count = mysql_result(mysql_query("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM skillsoverall"),0) or die(mysql_error()); 
	$from = (isset($_GET["from"]) && is_numeric($_GET["from"]) && $_GET["from"] < $count) ? $_GET["from"] : 0;

	$query = mysql_query ("SELECT * FROM skillsoverall ORDER BY xp DESC limit $from, $ppls_page") or die(mysql_error());

	$i = $from;
	while($row = mysql_fetch_array($query)){
	$i++;
	if($i < $top_hiscore) {

if($i & 1) {
echo ’

'; } else { echo ' '; 
	}
	}
	}
	echo '</tbody>
Rank Name Level XP
'.$i.' '.BBCode($row["playerName"]).' '.dots($row["lvl"]).' '.dots($row["xp"]).'
'.$i.' '.BBCode($row["playerName"]).' '.dots($row["lvl"]).' '.dots($row["xp"]).'
'; if($count >= $ppls_page) { echo '
'; if ($from > 0) { $back= $from - $ppls_page; echo 'Back '; } $page = 1; 
	for ($start = 0; $count > $start; $start = $start + $ppls_page) {
		if($from != $page * $ppls_page - $ppls_page) {
			if($start < $top_hiscore) {
				echo '<a href="'.$website.'/'.$file.'?type=0&from='.$start.'"><b>'.$page.'</b></a> ';
			}
		} else {
			echo $page.' ';
		}
		$page++;
	}

	if ($from < $count - $ppls_page || $from < $top_hiscore) {
		$next = $from + $ppls_page;
		if($next < $top_hiscore) {
			echo ' <a href="'.$website.'/'.$file.'?type=0&from='.$next.'"><b>Next</b></a>';
		}
	}
	echo "</td>
"; } }[/code]
